alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Deuel; Eastern Cherry; Garden; Grant; Hooker (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 12 at 3:46AM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Cherry, Garden, Grant, Hooker, Arthur, and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...From midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, including whiteout conditions. Strong winds could result in tree and power line damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heavy snow will be preceded by rain and a wintry mix, which may lead to a layer of ice underneath.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Deuel; Eastern Cherry; Garden; Grant; Hooker
